templates.label: Node.js 24
templates.description: Vercel Sandbox with Node.js 24 runtime. Fast startup, ephemeral microVM. Good for web development, API testing, and general Node.js tasks.

templates.label: Node.js 22
templates.description: Vercel Sandbox with Node.js 22 LTS runtime. Stable, production-grade runtime for Node.js development and testing.

templates.label: Python 3.13
templates.description: Vercel Sandbox with Python 3.13 runtime. For scripting, data processing, and Python development.
